glossdef.p: A designated derivative or (for a hedge of the risk of changes in foreign currency exchange rates only) a designated non‑derivative financial asset or non‑derivative financial liability whose fair value or cash flows are expected to offset changes in the fair value or cash flows of a designated hedged item (IAS 39 paragraphs 72–77 and AG94–AG97 elaborate on the definition of a hedging instrument).
